LICENSES & CERTIFICATION.Name: Programming Cloud Services for Android Handheld Systems

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Course Project in Software Engineering – Co-developed a web app for data presentation and visualization of student’s grade pointers, “Vizures”, using Python’s Django MVC framework, with MySQL database. Features included: show departmental ranking and university ranking for a given roll number, rank wise listing of all students in department, show a student’s profile containing his performance in comparison to others in the class

Remote project for Musejam Pvt. Ltd. – Developed (from scratch) a web app to perform collaboration on contacts list for events invitation management, “ContactCollab”, using PHP’s Laravel MVC framework, with MySQL for database, and AngularJS, Bootstrap for frontend. Features included: fetching of user’s contacts using Google Contacts API, creating new contacts, creating new events, associating contacts with an event and vice versa, inviting other users to collaborate on adding contacts to an event

Worked for Dr. Sudarshan Iyengar and Dr. Poonam Saini
-project title: “Crowdsourced Textbook: a futuristic online education tool
harnessing collaborative learning”
-co-developed an online platform for the project
-researched the improvement factor of learning and the behavioural patterns of
participants

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Crowd Sourced Annotation System for Textbooks.
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
“Sum is better than parts”­des' Cartes  
The  Wisdom  of  the  Crowd is undeniable. Over the years, tasks achieved by a group of people collectively have been found to be much better than those achieved individually. 
Famous  example  is  Wikipedia.  Instead  of  Wikipedia  creating  an  encyclopedia  on  their  own  by  hiring  writers  and editors,  they  gave   a  crowd  the  ability  to  create  the  information  on  their  own.  What  was  the  end  result?
The  most comprehensive encyclopedia this world has ever seen. 
If this works for Wikipedia why not for the textbooks?? 
where in the crowd enhances the quality of textbook content by adding the description(Q and A,Insights,Pointers to other useful resource on the web) in the form of annotations,under the guidance of Dr. Sudarshan Iyengar(IIT Ropar), Dr.Poonam Saini(PEC Institute of Technology) and Ms.Anamika Chabbra.

ORGANISATIONS.Name of Organisation: Jagadish Bose National Science Talent Search
